https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/6zBdFOpwhussPwxhtrbtOBvx2Yq.jpg A Japanese salaryman in Tokyo, a sub-Saharan community trying to cross the borders into Europe, a family evicted from their own home in Spain. Three stories intertwined on three different continents. This film is a reflection on the path that the human race is taking, on its habits and its relationship with the world. It is a proposal for change, from the particular to the general. We will take this journey with the words of Jos√© Mujica, former President of the Oriental Republic of Uruguay. Delicate Balance
